tool_description: Distributes surveys via email with personalization, delivery tracking, and bounce handling capabilities.

content_id.description: Content identifier from Survey Content Builder

recipient_list.description: List of email addresses or contact segment IDs

sender_name.description: Name to appear as email sender

personalization.description: Whether to personalize emails with recipient names

send_time.description: Scheduled send time in ISO 8601 format

tracking_enabled.description: Whether to enable open and click tracking

priority.description: Email priority level: low, normal, high

error_messages: Invalid content ID: Provided content_id does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid email format: Check that sender_email and reply_to_email are valid email addresses.
Recipient list too large: Maximum 5,000 recipients allowed per email campaign.
Invalid send time: send_time must be in future and in ISO 8601 format.
Authentication failed: Sender email domain not verified or lacks proper authentication.
Subject line too long: Email subject must be under 78 characters.
Invalid priority: Use one of [low, normal, high].
usage: Provide content_id, recipient_list, sender details, and subject_line. Optionally configure personalization, scheduling, and tracking. The tool handles email delivery and provides delivery status tracking.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the email campaign

emails_queued.description: Number of emails queued for delivery

delivery_status.description: Initial delivery status of the campaign
